articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Military Drill for Seizing Island
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Military Drill for Seizing Island
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided a drill for striking and seizing island.
					 He arrived at the drill ground, accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, Army General Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Army General Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, O Il Jong and Han Kwang Sang, department directors of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, and Ri Pyong Chol, first vice department director of the C.C., WPK.
					
					 Taking part in the drill were artillery units and sub-units of the KPA 4th Corps, including the Hero Defence Detachment on Mu Islet and the Defence Company on Jangjae Islet located in the biggest hotspot in the southernmost part of southwestern front.
					
					 The Supreme Commander gave orders to start the drill at the watch post after receiving from the commander of the 4th Corps a report about the decision on actions against the "enemy" provocation.
					
					 In the drill the artillery units fired coercive warning-shots to the "enemy" who made a reckless shell-fire toward territorial waters of the DPRK. Then a strong strike of fire was given to an island of the "enemy" who were taking desperate counteraction.
					
					 Whenever the artillerymen hit targets, Kim Jong Un expressed his great satisfaction, saying that they were very good at the concentration of fire and such shell-fire would remove the enemy island totally.
					
					 After the drill he reviewed its results and referred to the defects to be rectified by the artillery units. And he set forth the tasks and ways for further perfecting the Juche-based artillery tactics in conformity with the country's natural and topographical conditions.
					
					 Noting that he defined in detail the procedure of strike at objects on the enemy islands and its density, he said the drill clearly showed that the artillerymen of the 4th Corps defending the southwestern front are ready to throw the enemies into a crucible.
					
					 The KPA should totally remove formalism in the military training and conduct actual drills under various conditions of modern warfare so frequently, and it should always be in readiness to go into action and perform its duty immediately once the Supreme Commander gives orders in any time and under any circumstances, he stressed.
					
					 He said that the entire army should make their training more intensive, as the anti-Japanese guerrillas did in Mt. Paektu, to prepare all the soldiers as stalwart combatants and turn all units into an iron-willed guards unit and thus bring the anti-U.S. confrontation to the final conclusion by crushing the enemies promptly in case they pounce upon the DPRK.
					
					 Present to watch the drill were commanding officers of KPA large combined units.

articles.title: DRPK FM and His Party Leave to Visit Mongolia and Switzerland
articles.content:
DRPK FM and His Party Leave to Visit Mongolia and Switzerland
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong and his party left here Saturday to visit Mongolia and participate in the 28th  Session of the UN Human Rights Council to be held in Geneva.

articles.title: 19th Kimjongilia Festival Closes
articles.content:
19th Kimjongilia Festival Closes
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The 19th Kimjongilia Festival closed with due ceremony at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on Saturday. It opened on February 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The festival took place under the theme "Kimjongilias are in full bloom blessing the bright future of Songun Korea". It aroused the admiration of visitors with tens of thousands of potted Kimjongilias in full bloom.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop, Vice-premier Kim Yong Jin, officials of the organizing committee of the festival, service personnel and officials of different units that presented immortal flowers, members of the association for disseminating and supporting the immortal flower, people from all walks of life, schoolchildren and youth, overseas compatriots and foreigners.
					
					 At the ceremony diplomas of the festival prize bearing the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il were awarded to the units highly appreciated for their displayed flowers, the units which arranged their flower display tables in good formative arts, the units which bloomed flowers on a scientific and technological basis and the units which contributed to the successful festival.
					
					 The same diplomas went to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, cultivators of other units, individuals, overseas compatriots and foreigners for cultivating immortal flowers well on a sci-tech basis and contributing to the successful holding of the exhibition.
					
					 Many units, officials, working people, schoolchildren and young people who displayed immortal flowers were awarded certificates of the participation in the festival.
					
					 Kim Chang Do, chairman of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, made a closing speech.

articles.title: Pyongyang Cultured Language, Standard Korean
articles.content:
Pyongyang Cultured Language, Standard Korean
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Today is the international day of national languages.
					On this occasion, KCNA met Dr. Ri Song Ho, a researcher of the Linguistics Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences of the DPRK.
					
					Ri said:
					
					Pyongyang cultured language is the standard Korean in the country.
					
					Thanks to the Juche-oriented linguistic idea and policy of the Workers' Party of Korea, it has been steadily refined in concordance with the desire and sentiments of the Korean nation.
					
					It embraces all features of the Korean language and has an integrated norm of linguistic culture ranging from vocabulary to grammar. And it fully reflects the characteristics of the Korean nation and is easily accepted by all Koreans.
					
					President Kim Il Sung's popular and revolutionary writing style has laid a firm foundation of further developing it.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il in his lifetime has also paid deep attention to its development.
					
					Now, Pyongyang cultured language has reached a new higher stage of its development under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Carrying out Behests of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Carrying out Behests of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- An enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place in Pyongyang Wednesday under the guidance of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. It discussed the issue of holding fast to the behests of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il as eternal guidelines of our Party and the Korean revolution and carrying them out to the last and adopted a resolution.
					 Kim Jong Un made a historic conclusion at the meeting clearly indicating the task and ways of bringing about a revolutionary turn in the struggle to carry out the behests of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an editorial says that Kim Jong Un's important conclusion serves as a militant banner that all the party organizations, officials, party members and other working people should hold fast to in the drive to carry out the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The dynamic general offensive to carry out the spirit and task of the enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee is an honorable and worthwhile struggle to glorify the great Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea as the best thriving nation.
					
					 This year is the significant year marking the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the WPK.
					
					 It is worthwhile and significant to glorify this year, in which our Party and socialist Korea shining with the idea and august names of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il mark the great auspicious event, with the signal successes in carrying out the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of our party and the people, showed in practice the example of how to uphold with loyalty and translate into reality the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 All the party members, service personnel and other people should follow the noble traits of Kim Jong Un, supreme incarnation of revolutionary moral obligation, and work heart and soul to carry out the behests of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Drop Bad Habit of Kowtowing to U.S.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Drop Bad Habit of Kowtowing to U.S.
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities should get away from the shameful road of serving the U.S. before it is too late and opt to fundamentally solve the inter-Korean relations, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Their acts of following the U.S. are aimed to put "pressure" upon the DPRK and cause its "collapse", a foolish and anachronistic action.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have behaved mischievously, backed by their master U.S. This is little short of blindly following the U.S., being seized by inveterate repugnancy to the compatriots.
					
					 Whenever an opportunity presented itself, the south Korean puppet forces talked about a sort of "state status", but they have neither sovereignty nor right to independently map out any foreign policy and put it into practice.
					
					 Their acts of toeing the U.S. line aimed to invade the DPRK are a foolish one. And it will bring it nothing but the most miserable end.
					
					 The DPRK's confrontation with the U.S. is not only targeted against the latter.
					
					 If the puppet group persistently acts as a shock brigade of the U.S. to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, indifferent to the dignity and interests of the nation, they would become the main target of the toughest counteraction declared by the DPRK.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities spoil the golden opportunity of this year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation with their sycophancy toward the U.S. and the confrontation with compatriots, all the Koreans will never pardon them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Snubs U.S. Talk about "Threat" from DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Snubs U.S. Talk about "Threat" from DPRK
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. continues trumpeting about "threat from the DPRK".
					 New Secretary of Defence Ashton Carter, at his written testimony submitted to a recent confirmation hearing of the Armed Services Committee of the Senate held a few days before he took office, noted that the DPRK "is keen on conducting such acts of destabilizing the regional situation as bolstering up its nuclear and ballistic missile capacity and launching cyber attacks" to pose "direct threat" to the U.S. and its allies.
					
					 The chairperson of the International Relations Committee of the U.S. House of Representatives, the chief of the Defense Intelligence Agency, the assistant secretary of State for East Asian and Pacific Affairs and others in the U.S. political camp and military were all out to echo the above-said "threat".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary terms this a hysteric fit of the war maniacs hell-bent on escalating confrontation of social systems, being seized by inveterate repugnancy toward the DPRK.
					
					 This is also a revelation of their ulterior design to continuously push the situation on the Korean peninsula to an extreme pitch to foment north-south confrontation and thus catch fish in troubled waters, notes the commentary, adding:
					
					 It is an inveterate evil practice of the U.S. to pull up others over their non-existent "threat" to it if they incur its disfavor, ignite wars of aggression against them, put under its control their resources and batten on them.
					
					 So, it is quite natural for the U.S. to oft-repeat about "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. loudly talked about the "threat" when the DPRK was a non-nuclear state. Still it is repeating the trumpeting after the latter ranked itself among nuclear weapons states.
					
					 The U.S. stereo-typed trumpeting about "threat" reminds one of rabid dogs barking with fear at the moon.
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. barks about "threat" from the DPRK, it can never evade its responsibility for having escalated the situation on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korea's SL Denounced as Evil Law Violating Human Rights
articles.content:
S. Korea's SL Denounced as Evil Law Violating Human Rights
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea made public an inquiry report on Saturday to disclose before the world the fascist nature of the "Security Law" and the shuddering human rights abuses committed by the successive south Korean puppet forces by invoking the evil law.
					 The SL of south Korea is the worst fascist law unprecedented in world history, the inquiry report says, and goes on:
					
					 It was cooked up by traitor Syngman Rhee on Dec. 1, 1948 to suppress and stamp out progressive figures and other people of south Korea who stood against the pro-U.S. dictatorial regime. It was made up of hideous poisonous articles unprecedented in world legislative history.
					
					 It is the most unpopular and reactionary law that was modeled after the colonial suppressive ruling methods used by the imperialists.
					
					 It is just the repetition of "the Maintenance of the Public Order Act" which the Japanese imperialists invoked to maintain their colonial ruling system and suppress the Korean people's movement for national liberation against the Japanese during their rule over Korea.
					
					 "The Maintenance of the Public Order Act" which the Japanese imperialists enacted to suppress the communist movement inside Japan in April 1925 was an ill-famed law also in Japan's history of legislation. Provided for in the law were punishment up to death sentence to those who were involved in organization of association or who acceded to it and discussed or agitated the execution of the goal of association with an aim at the "change of state".
					
					 The SL was exactly same as "the Maintenance of the Public Order Act" in the light of the objective of its institution, the scope and objects of its application and punishment.
					
					 The evil law was coercively cooked up by the south Korean puppet clique at the instigation of the U.S. for its colonial rule over south Korea after its illegal entry to it.
					
					 At the time of fabrication, the SL was a provisional one as neither "criminal law" nor "criminal procedure code" was in force in south Korea. It, therefore, should have been repealed after the September 1953 institution of the criminal law and the September 1954 enactment of the criminal procedure code in south Korea.
					
					 No wonder, the majority of the then "National Assemblymen" opposed the SL and even the first president of the puppet Supreme Court Kim Pyong Ro held that "many problems will arise in terms of legislation if criminal law is instituted without abolishing the Security Law". But Syngman Rhee maintained the evil law under the patronage of the U.S., using it as a means for his dictatorial rule.
					
					 The SL is undemocratic and inhuman law violating even the elementary right of human being.
					
					  The SL was empowered to the indefinite violation of elementary rights of people on charges of "endangering the existence and security of state and basic order of freedom and democracy."
					
					 The anti-human rights and unethical nature of the SL is that it is blocking the national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 The SL brands the DPRK and organizations of overseas compatriots as "anti-government ones" and totally antagonizes the compatriots.
					
					 Its articles contain such words of antagonizing the fellow countrymen as "anti-government organizations" and "their members" and even label the DPRK an "enemy."
					
					 The SL is also wantonly checking the free visits, contacts and dialogue between the north and the south.
					
					 Noting that the fascist atrocities the south Korean puppet group have perpetrated by invoking the SL constitute the height of crimes against humanity and human rights, the inquiry report cites detailed facts to prove them.
					
					 Since Park Geun Hye took office, the SL has gotten ferocious, the report notes, adding:
					
					 The Park group is openly pushing ahead with the revision of the SL for the worse, which even traitor Lee Myung Bak dared not do, being hell-bent on fascist suppression.
					
					 During her early days in office, Park said sheer sophism that "the May 16 military coup was an inevitable and best choice". She has resorted to anachronistic fascist dictatorial rule after letting such remnants of "yusin" as Kim Ki Chun, Hwang Kyo An and Nam Jae Jun hold important posts of the secretariat of Chongwadae, the ministry of Justice and the Intelligence Service. 
					
					 In February 2013, the first year of her office, she sponsored the farce of a fascist trial against Ro Su Hui who had visited Pyongyang to express condolences over the greatest loss to the nation, which sentenced him to four-year imprisonment and suspension of qualification.
					
					 In October that year her group branded the Teachers Union, a typical progressive organization, as a "heart of followers of the north", "enemy in the country" that had taken the lead in the "pro-north" activities and deprived the union of its legitimate status. 
					
					 Moreover, in December it hurled 5 000 fascist policemen into storming the headquarters of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and arresting more than 130 including its vice-chairman.
					
					 The Park group, in a bid to suppress the Unified Progressive Party which had acted as a legitimate progressive political party, cooked up a conspiratorial rebellion case and put a lawmaker from the party into custody in broad daylight.
					
					 On December 19, it let the puppet judicial authorities forcibly dissolve the UPP after branding it as a "political party following the north" and termed it a "historic option that firmly protected the liberal democracy."
					
					 Early this year, the puppet group made an investigation into the Bar Association for Democratic Society, a progressive organization in south Korean judicial circles, openly revealing its sinister attempt to totally stamp out the progressive forces by invoking the SL, in actuality.
					
					 Branding even peaceable demonstrations and rallies as "operations of the pro-north left-wing forces to overthrow the government", the puppet group arrested and put into custody personages of progressive organizations after branding them as backstage manipulators and suppressed them at random.
					
					 It has also mercilessly violated the freedom of speech, press and expression by applying the SL.
					
					 In south Korea, there does not exist the freedom of criticizing the "government" and its confrontational policy, even though there may exist the freedom of defending the regime and slandering the fellow countrymen.
					
					 Therefore, not only south Koreans from all walks of life but the international community strongly demand the abolition of the SL and even Americans maintain that the SL must be abolished in the light of human rights.
					
					 However, the Park Geun Hye group made up of matchless human rights abusers and fascist dictators is keen on retrogressively revising the SL, far from repealing it.
					
					 It is ridiculous for those human rights abusers to talk such rubbish as "human rights issue" of someone.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group had better face up to the trend of the times, immediately abolish the SL and stop the "human rights racket" against the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces Leaflet-scattering Operations against North
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces Leaflet-scattering Operations against North
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea Tuesday held a press conference outside the puppet Seoul central district prosecutor's office denouncing the U.S. "Human Rights Foundation" for getting desperate in leaflet-scattering operations against the DPRK. 
					 The speakers, censuring the leaflet-scattering operations projected by those concerned of the "foundation" together with the "Alliance for the Movement of Free North", called for preventing the U.S. human rights plot-breeders from entering south Korea as they would only escalate the danger of a war and threaten the people's right to existence.
					
					 Urging the minister of Justice to opt for permanently forbidding their entry to south Korea, the speakers demanded the prosecution make an immediate investigation into those concerned of the "foundation" involved in the illegal leaflet scattering operations.

articles.title: New Type U.S. Warship to Be Involved in DPRK-targeted War Drills
articles.content:
New Type U.S. Warship to Be Involved in DPRK-targeted War Drills
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. aggressor forces have announced that a new type warship would be involved in their Foal Eagle joint military exercises targeting the DPRK, according to south Korean Yonhap News Tuesday.
					 The warship is reportedly the one manufactured by the U.S. to fit the sea conditions of Asia-Pacific to carry out its "rebalancing strategy" there.
					
					 The warship's involvement in the drills clearly shows the U.S. attempt to mount a preemptive attack upon the DPRK.

articles.title: Korean in Russia Is Confident of Victory of Korean People
articles.content:
Korean in Russia Is Confident of Victory of Korean People
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Chil Song, first vice-chairman of the International United Confederation of Koreans and chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, issued a statement titled "We are confident of victory of the Korean people" on Feb. 9.
					 The statement fully supported the statement of the DPRK National Defence Commission which warned that the brigandish U.S. imperialists obsessed with the hostile policy toward the DPRK would face a final doom. 
					
					 The U.S. has imposed severe blockade and sanctions at the DPRK for more than half a century to bring down its social system and conducted the subversive activities and sabotage against it by abusing the UN name to realize its ambition, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists can never bring the Korean people to their knees as they have sovereignty and the spirit of defending their country.
					
					 We denounce the U.S. policy to dominate the world and the hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 We fully support the Korean people in their heroic struggle under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and are confident of their victory.

articles.title: Koreans in Kyrgyzstan Celebrate Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Koreans in Kyrgyzstan Celebrate Day of Shining Star
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan celebrated the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) at the Korean Center in Bishkek on Feb. 16.
					 Present there were Chairman Pak Kyong Ho and other officials of the confederation and compatriots there.
					
					 They laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the portraits of smiling Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and made a bow to them.
					
					 Chairman Pak Kyong Ho said he came to look back on the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il who performed great exploits for the country and nation on the significant Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il is always alive in the hearts of the people for his wise idea, leadership art and virtues.
					
					 His cause is being successfully carried forward and translated into brilliant reality by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 All the Koreans residing in Kyrgyzstan will make positive contribution to opening up a broad avenue to the independent reunification of the country in keeping pace with the people in the DPRK.
					
					 They watched a Korean film showing the exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Then followed a performance by the art group of compatriots there.

articles.title: Koreans in Uzbekistan Celebrate Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Koreans in Uzbekistan Celebrate Day of Shining Star
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- An event celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) took place at the DPRK embassy in Tashkent on February 16. 
					 Present at the event were officials of Korean organizations including the "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan, heads of Korean art troupes and other Koreans in Uzbekistan. 
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the full-length portrait of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them. 
					
					 Ju Yong Il, chairman of the above-said Association, said Koreans are looking back on the undying exploits of the peerlessly great man for the country and the people on the Day of the Shining Star. 
					
					 Today we are confident of the rosy future of the country and national reunification, witnessing the changes taking place in the country under the wise leadership of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, he said, adding: 
					
					 We will make positive contributions to the drive for opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification by pooling efforts of all the Koreans in the north, south and overseas this year of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation true to the behests of the great generalissimo for national reunification. 
					
					 A photo exhibition was held under the theme "Great leader of the Korean people Comrade Kim Jong Il". 
					
					 The participants watched a Korean film documenting historical activities of Kim Jong Il giving field-guidance to different fields of national economy. 
					
					 They also watched videos introducing Mirim Riding Club and Munsu Water Park. 
					
					 On February 3 a meeting and photo exhibition celebrating the Day of the Shining Star took place at the building of the "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in UK
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in UK
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its internet website a special write-up "Star of independence" with a photo of leader Kim Jong Il on February 9 to honor his birth anniversary. 
					 An article subtitled "73rd birth anniversary of great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il" praised the noble and revolutionary career of the peerlessly great man and his undying exploits. 
					
					 Another article subtitled "Leader Kim Jong Il rejects theory of 'reform' and 'opening'" said that he made public famous works to scientifically prove the advantages of Korean-style socialism and its invincibility when the imperialists and renegades of socialism talked about "final end of socialism" in the wake of collapse of socialism in some countries in the mid 1990s. 
					
					 An article subtitled "Work of great Comrade Kim Jong Il 'The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution'" said:
					
					 As Kim Jong Il indicated in the work, the single-minded unity of Korean society was further strengthened and invincible military power was fully demonstrated thanks to the Songun politics. 
					
					 Miracles and innovations have been made day by day in building a thriving nation in the DPRK. 
					
					 The strong might of the Korean People's Army, banner of the Songun revolution, has been fully demonstrated not only in national defence but also in the socialist construction.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in Mexico, Guinea, Thailand
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in Mexico, Guinea, Thailand
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Diverse events took place in Mexico, Guinea and Thailand to honor the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star). 
					 A seminar on the work of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was held in Mexico, reading-session and film shows in Guinea and Thailand from February 9 to 14. 
					
					 Korean films including "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" were shown in the film shows. 
					
					 The chairman of the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea and other personages referred to the profundity and significance of Kim Jong Un's work and expressed the will to activate the work for the study and dissemination of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the future. 
					
					 The executive manager of a Guinean company said that February 16 is the most significant holiday for not only the Korean people but also the progressive mankind. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the great statesman and model of genuine patriot who led the Korean revolution to victory, he said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il prioritized the future of the country, always looking hundreds of years ahead when he shaped any line and policy during the whole period of leading the country and the people. 
					
					 It was the goal of Kim Jong Il's life and his greatest pleasure to devote himself to the building of a prosperous country and happiness of the people. 
					
					 The image of Kim Jong Il who devoted his everything to the rosy future of the country and the people will remain in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the progressives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Brazilian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Brazilian Figure
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, made public the following statement on February 12:
					 There are many great men who made contributions to progressive development of mankind in history. 
					
					 However, history does not know such a great man as HE Kim Jong Il who performed undying exploits for the cause of global independence with matchless great idea and leadership ability. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il indicated bright ways for the human cause of independence with the great idea. 
					
					 He energetically waged ideological and theoretical activities for formulating correct theories, strategies and tactics for implementing the cause of global independence. 
					
					 With outstanding leadership ability Kim Jong Il led the cause of global independence to victory. 
					
					 The most important one of his exploits is that he pursued the unique Songun politics to firmly defend Korean socialism and world peace. 
					
					 Thanks to his Songun politics the self-reliant defence capabilities of the DPRK were exceptionally bolstered up. 
					
					 He paid deep attention to the development of relations with different countries aspiring after independence and energetically conducted external activities to build a new world where the idea of independence, peace and friendship is embodied. 
					
					 His energetic external activities gave great impetus to the relations among countries and great influence to the world situation and powerfully promoted the cause of global independence. 
					
					 The exploits of Kim Jong Il for the cause of global independence will be immortal.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Russian Paper
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The first part of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Our Socialism Centred on the Masses Shall Not Perish" was carried by Russian paper Moskovskii Komsomolets on February 12.
					 The first part of the work published on May 5, Juche 80 (1991) clarifies the idea that socialism of the DPRK is based on the Juche idea, a man-centered outlook on the world.
					
					 The paper carried photos of Kim Jong Il meeting with Russian President Putin and former Russian President Medvedev.
					
					 It also carried a photo of a monument erected in commemoration of Kim Jong Il's visit to Khabarovsk.

articles.title: DPRK Slogans Supported by British Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK Slogans Supported by British Organizations
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and Korean Friendship Association UK on February 12 made public a joint statement in support of the joint slogans set forth by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea on the occasion of the 70th anniversaries of the liberation of Korea and the founding of the WPK. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The 70th anniversaries of the liberation of Korea and the founding of the WPK are very significant ones for the DPRK. 
					
					 Under the guidance of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, iron-willed brilliant commander, the Korean people put an end to the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists and achieved national independence 70 years ago. 
					
					 The invincible WPK, guiding force of the Korean people and organizer, was founded the year Korea was liberated. 
					
					 The joint slogans reflecting the revolutionary and militant spirit will give great courage to the Korean people and the world revolutionary and progressive people and deal heavy blows to the imperialists dreaming of "collapse" and "change of regime" in the DPRK. 
					
					 We fully support the joint slogans of the WPK Central Committee and Central Military Commission and sincerely hope that DPRK will achieve great change in the building of a thriving nation this significant year.

articles.title: Seminars on Exploits of Kim Jong Il Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Exploits of Kim Jong Il Held Abroad
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Seminars on exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Dhaka of Bangladesh, Sofia of Bulgaria and at the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany, the branch groups of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on February 11 and 12.
					 Displayed at venues of the seminars were photos showing revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il and exploits of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh said that Kim Jong Il performed immortal exploits before the era and history by leading the Korean revolution to victory with brilliant wisdom, outstanding ideology and theory and extraordinary leadership ability for a long period.
					
					 Speakers including the chairman of the Bulgarian Communists' Party praised him for glorifying the immortal Juche idea as a guiding ideology of the era of independence, further developing the Workers' Party of Korea into an experienced and seasoned invincible revolutionary party and a mother party absolutely supported and trusted by the popular masses and firmly defending the DPRK and revolution and socialism holding aloft the banner of Songun.
					
					 The chief of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany said that the DPRK became to shed its bright rays as the beacon of hope of the world progressive peoples and the global cause of socialism was rescued from crisis thanks to Kim Jong Il's Songun politics.
					
					 A chief of the branch group of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that exploits HE Kim Jong Il performed for the cause of global independence will be cherished in the hearts of humankind forever.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Bulgaria.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige entrenamiento militar de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige entrenamiento militar de EPC
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, organizo y dirigio el entrenamiento de fuego artillero para apoderarse de isla.
					El Mariscal llego al lugar de entrenamiento, junto con el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC Hyon Yong Chol, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC Ri Yong Gil, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, asi como O Il Jong y Han Kwang Sang, jefes de departamento del Comite Central del PTC y Ri Pyong Chol, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC.
					
					Tomaron parte en el simulacro las unidades y subunidades de artilleria adscritas al 4o cuerpo del EPC, inclusive la unidad heroina de defensa de la isla Mu y la compania de defensa de la isla Jangjae, situadas en la zona mas candente del extremo meridional del frente suroeste.
					
					En el puesto de vigilancia, el Mariscal escucho desde el jefe del cuerpo citado el parte de decision frente a las provocaciones de los "enemigos" y ordeno iniciar el entrenamiento.
					
					Primero, los artilleros dispararon los coercitivos fuegos de advertencia a los "enemigos" que disparaban con imprudencia los proyectiles hacia nuestras aguas jurisdiccionales. Y seguidamente hicieron el fuerte ataque de fuego a la isla de los "enemigos" que se enfrentan desesperadamente.
					
					Cada vez que los artilleros acertaban los blancos enemigos, el Comandante Supremo expreso gran satisfaccion diciendo que es loable el arte de canonazos de los artilleros y mejor la densidad de fuego y agrego que si disparan de esta manera sera eliminada totalmente  la isla de los enemigos.
					
					Terminado el entrenamiento, el Mariscal hizo balance de su resultado e indico los defectos a ser superados por las subunidades de artilleria. Enseno las tareas y los remedios que se presentan en perfeccionar mas las autoctonas tacticas de artilleria de acuerdo con las condiciones geofisicas de Corea.
					
					Dijo que el mismo determino en detalles el orden de ataque a los objetos de las islas enemigas y la densidad de fuego y siguio que el entrenamiento efectuado hoy ha mostrado bien que los artilleros del 4o cuerpo, que defienden el frente suroeste, estan bien preparados para arrasar los nidos de los enemigos.
					
					Destaco que el EPC debe erradicar el formalismo en el entrenamiento y estar siempre listo para entrar rapido en el combate y cumplir el deber una vez que el Comandante Supremo de la orden en cualquier tiempo y circunstancia al organizar con frecuencia los ejercicios practicos en diversas condiciones de la guerra contemporanea.
					
					Puntualizo que todo el ejercito debe desarrollar intensamente sus ejercicios con el espiritu del monte Paektu, para formar a todos uniformados como tigres del monte Paektu y como combatientes capaces de aniquilar uno a cien enemigos, convertir todas las unidades en las guardias de acero y asi sacar la cuenta final en la confrontacion antiyanqui al arrasar a todos los enemigos si estos se atreven a agredir a la RPDC. 
					
					Presenciaron el entrenamiento los comandantes de las grandes unidades combinadas del EPC.

articles.title: Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en Sur de Corea publica informacion de investigacion
articles.content:
Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en Sur de Corea publica informacion de investigacion
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- La Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea publico el dia 21 una informacion de investigacion con el fin de revelar la verdad fascista y anti-derechos humanos de la "ley de seguridad" y los crimenes atroces de violacion de DDHH cometidos por la banda titere surcoreana en virtud de esta ley infame.
					La "ley de seguridad" del Sur de Corea es la peor fascista sin precedente y la infame de exterminio de DDHH, critica la informacion y continua:
					
					La "ley de seguridad" fue fabricada el primero de diciembre de 1948 por el traidor Syngman Rhee con el fin de reprimir y exterminar la lucha de las personalidades progresistas del Sur de Corea contra el "poder" dictatorial proyanqui.
					
					Esta compuesta por los venenosos articulos anti-DDHH sin precedente en la historia de legislacion del mundo.
					
					En primer lugar, la "ley de seguridad" es la  mas antipopular y reaccionaria que repite el metodo de gobernacion represiva colonial del imperialismo.
					
					Imito la "ley de mantenimiento de seguridad publica" que despues de ocupar Corea, los imperialistas japoneses aplicaron para mantener el sistema de dominacion colonial y reprimir el movimiento del pueblo coreano por la liberacion nacional antijaponesa.
					
					En abril de 1925 los imperialistas japoneses la instituyeron con el fin de reprimir el movimiento comunista en el pais.
					
					La ley estipula castigar hasta la pena capital en cuanto a la organizacion de asociacion y el ingreso en ella, la consulta y la agitacion  encaminadas a realizar su objetivo.
					
					La "ley de seguridad" la fabrico por la fuerza Estados Unidos que ocupo ilegalmente el Sur de Corea despues de la liberacion de Corea, incitando a la banda titere surcoreana para su gobernacion colonial.
					
					Era la ley provisional establecida bajo la circunstancia en que en el Sur de Corea todavia no fueron instituidos el "codigo penal" ni la "ley de procedimiento penal", razon por la cual se debia anular merecidamente despues de establecidas susodichas leyes en septiembre de 1953 y en septiembre de 1954.
					
					Por lo tanto, en aquel tiempo la mayoria de los parlamentarios se opuso a la "ley de seguridad" y el primer presidente de la Corte Suprema titere, Kim Pyong Ro, tambien abogo por la cancelacion de esa ley diciendo que "si instituye el codigo penal sin anular la ley de seguridad, surgira el problema legal".
					
					Pero el traidor Syngman Rhee la mantuvo bajo la proteccion de EE.UU. y la tomo como medio para la gobernacion dictatorial.
					
					La "ley de seguridad" es la antidemocratica y antietica que viola y extermina hasta los elementales derechos de los seres humanos.
					
					Estipula violar ilimitadamente los derechos elementales de los habitantes bajo el pretexto "legal", segun el cual se pone en peligro el "orden principal de la existencia, la seguridad y la democracia liberal del Estado".
					
					El caracter anti-DDHH y antietico de la "ley de seguridad" reside en impedir la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					La "ley  de seguridad" determina la RPDC y las organizaciones de los coreanos en ultramar como "entidad anti-estatal" y considera a los connacionales como enemigo.
					
					En los articulos de la ley estan anotadas las expresiones hostiles contra los compatriotas incluyendo la "entidad anti-estatal" y los "miembros de la entidad anti-estatal" y califica  la RPDC de "pais enemigo".
					
					Igualmente la ley obstruye perversamente el viaje libre, el contacto y el dialogo entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					Despues de que Park Geun-hye tomo el poder, esta ley se torna mas salvaje en el Sur de Corea. 
					
					La banda de Park impulsa abiertamente la enmienda de la "ley de seguridad", que no se atrevio a hacerla siquiera el traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					Desde el primer periodo de su mandato, Park Geun-hye disparateo que el "golpe militar del 16 de mayo fue la mejor opcion inevitable" e recurrio a gobernacion dictatorial fascista poniendo a los elementos sobrevivientes de "Yusin (renovacion)" como Kim Ki Chun, Hwang Kyo An y Nam Jae Jun en los importantes cargos del gabinete de los secretario de Chongwadae, el Ministerio de Justicia y el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia.
					
					En febrero de 2013, primer ano de su mandato, la banda de Park juzgo a Ro Su Hui, vicepresidente de la direccion surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria, quien regreso despues de visitar Pyongyang para expresar pesame por el fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, y le condeno a 4 anos de prision y a 4 anos de suspension de calidad. 
					
					En octubre del mismo ano, arrebato por la fuerza la posicion legal del Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes, entidad progresista representante del circulo de ensenanza surcoreana, y en diciembre lanzo a mas de 5 mil  policias gangsteres a registrar la direccion de la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos (CSS), ocasion en la cual detuvo a mas de 130 miembros inclusive su vicepresidente.
					
					Orquesto el intrigante incidente de rebelion interna a fin de reprimir el Partido Progresista Unido, organizacion politica progresista legal en el Sur de Corea, y encarcelo al "parlamentario" pertenecido al PPU en virtud de la "ley de seguridad".
					
					El 19 de diciembre del ano pasado, instigo a las autoridades de la Justicia a descomponer a fuerza el PPU tildandolo de "partido pro-Norte", y elogio el hecho como "decision historica que defendio firmemente la democracia libre".
					
					En los primeros dias de este ano, mostro abiertamente su intento maligno de exterminar totalmente a las fuerzas progresistas en virtud de la "ley de seguridad", al  iniciar la investigacion sobre la Union de Abogados para la Sociedad Democrata, entidad progresista del circulo de justicia.
					
					Al determinar las manifestaciones y mitines de caracter pacifico como "operaciones de las fuerzas izquierdas pro-Norte orientadas a derribar el gobierno", detuvo y encarcelo sin piedad a las personalidades de entidades progresistas acusandolas de controladores traseros y reprimio sin discriminacion a los participantes tildandolos como "fuerzas para vuelco de regimen".
					
					En virtud de la "ley de seguridad, la camarilla de Park viola severamente la libertad de expresion de los medios de prensa.
					
					Hoy dia, en el Sur de Corea si hay la "libertad de la expresion" para proteger el "gobierno" y denigrar a los connacionales, pero no  hay la libertad para censurar al "gobierno" o criticar la politica conflictiva del gobierno.
					
					Por esta razon, diversos estratos del Sur de Corea demandan fuertemente la abolicion de la "ley de seguridad" y siquiera en el territorio norteamericano se oye la insistencia en la necesidad de anularla desde el punto de vista de derechos humanos.
					
					Sin embargo, los maniacos de la banda de Park tratan de enmendar mas maligna esta ley.
					
					Tales tipejos se atreven a cuestionar cinicamente el "problema de DDHH" de alguien.
					
					La camarilla de Park debe renunciar sin demora la "ley de seguridad" viendo correctamente la corriente de la epoca y abandonar de inmediato la campana intrigante de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela mala intencion de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela mala intencion de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos sigue difundiendo el rumor de la "amenaza" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Ashton Carter, electo como nuevo secretario de Defensa de EE.UU., presento el testimonio por escrito ante la audiencia de aprobacion de la Comision Senatorial de Servicios Armados del Congreso antes de ocupar el nuevo cargo, ocasion en la cual dijo que la RPDC "sigue desarrollando las acciones inestables en la region intensificando la capacidad de las armas nucleares y misiles balisticos y haciendo el ataque cibernetico", lo que crea la "amenaza directa" a EE.UU. y los paises aliados.
					
					Igualmente el presidente del Comite de Relaciones Exteriores de la Camara de Representantes, el jefe de la Agencia de Inteligencia de Defensa adscrito al Departamento de Defensa, el asistente del secretario para Asia Oriental y el Pacifico del Departamento de Estado y otros del circulo politico y la capa militar de Estados Unidos lanzaron disparates de la "amenaza" de la RPDC.
					
					Esto es el ultimo esfuerzo desesperado de los maniacos belicos enloquecidos por el patologico sentimiento de negacion a la RPDC y la confrontacion de regimenes.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este sabado y continua:
					
					Ademas deviene la expresion de la mala intencion de sacar provecho al fomentar la confrontacion fratricida empeorando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Si otros paises no le agradan, EE.UU. provoca la guerra agresiva acusandolos de "amenaza" y saca beneficio exorbitante apoderandose de los recursos de ellos, lo que es el arraigado vicio del imperio yanqui.
					
					Es anormal si EE.UU. no habla de la "amenaza" de la RPDC.
					
					Cuando la RPDC era un Estado desnuclearizado, lo disparateo atrozmente y hoy tambien en que se ha convertido en un pais poseedor de las armas nucleares lo picotea persistentemente.
					
					Por mucho que hable ruidosamente de la "amenaza" de la RPDC, EE.UU. no puede evitar nunca su responsabilidad de haber creado la situacion tensa en la Peninsula Coreana.
